 Distinct Affected Cells
 ACTIVE
 
 count(distinct(decode(cemod.aggregate1.number_of_failures,0,NULL,{Location\Cell Sac ID with LAC MCC MNC})))
 count(distinct(decode(cemod.aggregate1.number_of_failures,0,NULL,{Location\Cell Sac ID with LAC MCC MNC})))
 This indicates the total number of cells where the number of failure is greater than Zero. KQI =\xe2\x88\x91 Count (Distinct (CELL-SAC-ID)) Where NUMBER_OF_FAILURES > 0.
 ps_sms_l2_1_day,ps_sms_l2_1_hour
 
 
 Distinct Affected Locations
 ACTIVE
 
 count(distinct decode(cemod.aggregate1.number_of_failures,0,NULL,{Location\Loc ID}))
 count(distinct decode(cemod.aggregate1.number_of_failures,0,NULL,{Location\Loc ID}))
 This indicates the number of location where the number of failures is greater than zero. KQI =\xe2\x88\x91 Count (Distinct (LOCATION_FULL_NAME)) Where NUMBER_OF_FAILURES > 0.
 ps_sms_l2_1_day,ps_sms_l2_1_hour
 
 
 Distinct Cells
 ACTIVE
 
 count(distinct {Location\Cell Sac ID with LAC MCC MNC})
 count(distinct {Location\Cell Sac ID with LAC MCC MNC})
 This indicates the total number of cell ids defined in the network. KQI =\xe2\x88\x91 Count (Distinct (CELL-SAC-ID))
 ps_sms_l2_1_day,ps_sms_l2_1_hour
 
 
 Distinct Locations
 ACTIVE
 
 count(distinct {Location\Loc ID})
 count(distinct {Location\Loc ID})
 This indicates the distinct count of all locations defined in the network. One location may contain one or more LAC/Cell ID. KPI=\xe2\x88\x91Count(distinct(Loc_id )
 ps_sms_l2_1_day,ps_sms_l2_1_hour
 
 
 Distinct Device Models
 ACTIVE
 
 count(distinct cemod.aggregate1.handset_full_name)
 count(distinct cemod.aggregate1.handset_full_name)

 Distinct Users
 ACTIVE
 
 count(distinct cemod.aggregate1.imsi)
 count(distinct cemod.aggregate1.imsi)
 This indicates the set of distinct users with failures. KPI=\xe2\x88\x91count(distinct(IMSI))
 ps_sms_l2_1_day,ps_sms_l2_1_hour
 
 
 Distinct Users MO
 ACTIVE
 
 count(distinct case when cemod.aggregate1.sms_type = 0 then cemod.aggregate1.imsi else NULL end)
 count(distinct case when cemod.aggregate1.sms_type = 0 then cemod.aggregate1.imsi else NULL end)
 This indicates the set of distinct users with mobile originated SMS failures. KPI=\xe2\x88\x91count(distinct(IMSI)) and SMS_TYPE=MO
 ps_sms_l2_1_day,ps_sms_l2_1_hour
 
 
 Distinct Users MT
 ACTIVE
 
 count(distinct case when cemod.aggregate1.sms_type = 2 then cemod.aggregate1.imsi else NULL end)
 count(distinct case when cemod.aggregate1.sms_type = 2 then cemod.aggregate1.imsi else NULL end)
 This indicates the set of distinct users with mobile Terminated SMS failures. KPI=\xe2\x88\x91count(distinct(IMSI)) and SMS_TYPE=MT
 ps_sms_l2_1_day,ps_sms_l2_1_hour
 
 
 Distinct Users with volume
 ACTIVE
 
 count(distinct (case when cemod.aggregate1.number_of_sms>0 then cemod.aggregate1.imsi_id else NULL end))
 count(distinct (case when cemod.aggregate1.number_of_sms>0 then cemod.aggregate1.imsi_id else NULL end))
 This represents the count of distinct subscribers who have either sent or received SMS i.e., subscirber who have used SMS facility. KPI=\xe2\x88\x91count(distinct(IMSI)) Where NUMBER_OF_SMS > 0
 ps_sms_l2_1_day,ps_sms_l2_1_hour
 
 
 Distinct Users with volume MO
 ACTIVE
 
 count(distinct (case when cemod.aggregate1.sms_type = 0 and (cemod.aggregate1.number_of_sms)>0 then cemod.aggregate1.imsi_id else NULL end))
 count(distinct (case when cemod.aggregate1.sms_type = 0 and (cemod.aggregate1.number_of_sms)>0 then cemod.aggregate1.imsi_id else NULL end))
 This represents the count of distinct subscribers who have sent SMS i.e., subscirber who have used SMS facility. KPI=\xe2\x88\x91count(distinct(IMSI)) Where NUMBER_OF_SMS > 0 && SMS_TYPE = 0
 ps_sms_l2_1_day,ps_sms_l2_1_hour
 
 
 Distinct Users with volume MT
 ACTIVE
 
 count(distinct (case when cemod.aggregate1.sms_type = 2 and (cemod.aggregate1.number_of_sms)>0 then cemod.aggregate1.imsi_id else NULL end))
 count(distinct (case when cemod.aggregate1.sms_type = 2 and (cemod.aggregate1.number_of_sms)>0 then cemod.aggregate1.imsi_id else NULL end))
 This represents the count of distinct subscribers who have received SMS i.e., subscirber who have used SMS facility.KPI=\xe2\x88\x91count(distinct(IMSI)) Where NUMBER_OF_SMS > 0 && SMS_TYPE = 2
 ps_sms_l2_1_day,ps_sms_l2_1_hour
 
 
 Percentage of Distinct Users with volume
 ACTIVE
 
 round(nvl((({Measure\Distinct Users with volume}/{Measure\Distinct Users})*100),0),2)
 round(nvl((({Measure\Distinct Users with volume}/{Measure\Distinct Users})*100),0),2)
 This represents the percentage of distinct subscribers who has either sent or received SMS w.r.t total distinct subscribers. KQI = (\xe2\x88\x91(Distinct Users with volume))/(\xe2\x88\x91(Distinct Users))*100
 ps_sms_l2_1_day,ps_sms_l2_1_hour

 ACTIVE

 ACTIVE

 Number of SMS
 ACTIVE

 sum(cemod.aggregate1.number_of_sms)

 ACTIVE

 ACTIVE

 round(nvl((({Measure\Failure MO}/{Measure\Number of SMS MO})*100),0),2)

 Percentage Subscriber Failure
 ACTIVE
 
 round(nvl((({Measure\Subscriber Failure}/{Measure\Number of SMS})*100),0),2)
 round(nvl((({Measure\Subscriber Failure}/{Measure\Number of SMS})*100),0),2)
 This KQI determines the percentage of subscriber failures with respect to total failures. KQI = (\xe2\x88\x91(SUBSCRIBER_FAILURE) )/(\xe2\x88\x91(NUMBER_OF_FAILURES))*100

 Percentage Network Failure
 ACTIVE
 
 round(nvl((({Measure\Network Failure}/{Measure\Number of SMS})*100),0),2)
 round(nvl((({Measure\Network Failure}/{Measure\Number of SMS})*100),0),2)
 SMS Failures due to Network Related errors over Total Number of SMS KQI = (Network Failure)/(Number_of_Failures)*100
 ps_sms_l2_1_day,ps_sms_l2_1_hour
 
 
 Avg Delivery Time
 ACTIVE
 
 round(sum(cemod.aggregate1.delivery_time)/ sum(cemod.aggregate1.total_success_sms),2)
 round(sum(cemod.aggregate1.delivery_time)/ sum(cemod.aggregate1.total_success_sms),2)
 This KPI gives the average SMS delay time for a subscriber. KPI=\xe2\x88\x91(DELIVERY_TIME )/\xe2\x88\x91(TOTAL_SUCCESS_SMS )

 Affected Subscribers Delayed SMS
 ACTIVE
 
 count(distinct (case when (cemod.aggregate1.delivery_time/cemod.aggregate1.total_success_sms) > cemod.aggregate1.delivery_time_threshold then cemod.aggregate1.imsi_id else NULL end))

 Delayed SMS Rate
 ACTIVE

 This KPI gives the percentage of the long success SMS. KQI = (\xe2\x88\x91(NUMBER_OF_DELAYED_SUCCESS_SMS))/(\xe2\x88\x91(NUMBER_OF_SUCCESS_SMS))*100

 ACTIVE

 Percentage of Affected Subscribers Delayed SMS
 ACTIVE

 This indicates the percentage of affected subscribers for delayed SMS w.r.t active subscribers KQI = (\xe2\x88\x91(AFFECTED_SUBSCRIBERS))/(\xe2\x88\x91(ACTIVE_SUBSCRIBERS))*100

 ACTIVE
